thread.section_title: torfx.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of torfx.com.au | torfx.com.au
thread.title: Francoise Dupen

author: Francoise Dupen
title: Francoise Dupen
text: I just recently used TorFX for the first time to transfer currency from New Zealand to Australia. I found our banker, Jamie, absolutely fantastic. He was incredibly helpful and made the entire process very easy and stress free for us. Opening a TorFX Account on their website is also easy easy. I was able to contact Jamie regularly to discuss live rates etc and seek his advice on when would be best time and way to transfer our money. He explained process to me in a way that I could easily understand and therefore I was able to make informed decisions. I would thoroughly recommend TorFX to anyone wishing to transfer money.
